name: K-nit Howitt New Handmade Hat Winter Fair Isle Knit Beanie - Green Slope
description:
K-nit Howitt Fair Isle Bobble Beanie - Cotton Lined

K-nit is a completely handmade in the UK brand with all the yarns sourced within the British Isles and to highest quality. Every hat is individually made for you with the greatest love and attention.

As part of the K-nit Fair Isle range this hat is not short of vibrant colour or detailed patterning. Each Fair Isle hat is individually hand made with a domestic hand frame machine using 100% Lambswool to ensure a natural soft feel. A cotton lining creates amazing comfort against the ears whilst the outer wool layer provides great insulation. The Opie style allows the hat to stretch to the shape of the head with some slack at the end so there is room to wear the beanie how the wearer likes.

Features Include:

- Cotton Lining 
- Bobble 
- Fair Isle Pattern 
- Woven branding label

Material: 100% Lambswool, Lining: 100% Cotton

name: K-nit Cormack Hand Knit Winter Hat Bobble Beanie - Squareway To Heaven
description:
K-nit Cormack Beanie

The Cormack Beanie is the result of evolution from the very first K-nit beanie ever made. It is knitted on a domestic hand machine using the highest quality man-made acrylic yarn that was dyed and spun in the foothills of the Italian Alps.

This Beanie has a superb fit that just moulds around the head and a soft cotton lining that creates comfort town around the scalp. This range allows us to get extremely creative with our Fair Isle patterns and chuck in some mad retro colour combinations. If you are serious about keeping your head safely heated while getting some heads turning then this is an essential for your wintery collection.

Features Include:

-	Pom Pom 
-	Reinforced Hem 
-	Fair Isle Contrast Pattern 
-	Branded Woven Label 
-       Cotton Lining

Material: 100% Acrylic, Lining: 100% Cotton , Knitting Gauge: 7

name: K-nit Arthur Hand Knit Winter Hat Bobble Beanie - Who Said Red Is Dead?
description:
The Arthur beanie really is one of a kind with heaps of style, colour and quality. This beanie is knitted on a domestic hand machine using only the most awesome soft merino wool. We have thrown a few radical colours and a unique pattern into the mix and boom here you have it. 

The beanie dons a turn up rib for extra warmth around the ears and forehead while having a bit of extra slack to allow the warm air to circulate. No matter whether you are slicing apart the slopes or fighting the day to day chills this hat will keep you toasty and looking the shiz-niz.

Features Include:

-	Pom Pom
-	Turn Up Rib
-	Multicolour Pattern
-	Branded Woven Label

Material: 100% Merino Wool

name: K-nit Cormack Fair Isle Squares Beanie - Orange/Sky Blue
description:
The Cormack Beanie is the result of evolution from the very first K-nit beanie ever made. It’s design is more simple than most of the other styles but still reeks of radness. Like the others this beanie is completely hand knitted in the UK on a domestic hand machine using uber comfortable acrylic.

A superb fit that just moulds around the head and creates comfort town around the scalp. This range sports the classically popular Fair Isle pattern using two contrasting colours which is sure to stand out. With the freaking awesome price point tag and the handmade label this is a must have for anyone serious about keeping their head safe this winter.

Features Include:

-	Pom Pom
-	Reinforced Hem
-	Fair Isle Contrast Pattern
-	Branded Woven Label

Material: 100% Acrylic

This range sports the classically popular Fair Isle pattern using two contrasting colours which is sure to stand out. With the freaking awesome price point tag and the handmade label this is a must have for anyone serious about keeping their head safe this winter.

Features Include:

-	Pom Pom
-	Reinforced Hem
-	Fair Isle Contrast Pattern
-	Branded Woven Label

Material: 100% Acrylic

name: K-nit Howitt Fair Isle Beanie - Blueberry Bubblegum
description:
K-nit Howitt Fair Isle Bobble Beanie - Cotton Lined

K-nit is a completely handmade in the UK brand with all the yarns we use sourced within the British Isles and to highest quality. Every hat is individually made for you with the greatest love and attention.

As part of the K-nit Fair Isle range this hat is not short of vibrant colour or detailed patterning. Each Fair Isle hat is individually hand made with a domestic hand frame machine using 100% Lambswool to ensure a natural soft feel. A cotton lining creates amazing comfort against the ears whilst the outer wool layer provides great insulation. The Opie style allows the hat to stretch to the shape of the head with some slack at the end so there is room to wear the beanie how the wearer likes. 

Features Include:

- Cotton Lining
- Bobble
- Fair Isle Pattern
- Woven branding label

Material: 100% Lambswool, Lining: 100% Cotton
